ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Any tips for Wizards?
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah...found out by seeing the GUCOMICS.com...heh suggest you just take an hour and review ALL the comics
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah...found out by seeing the GUCOMICS.com...heh suggest you just take an
hour and review ALL the comics

> Sent: Thursday, April 19, 2001 7:52 PM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Any tips for Wizards?
>
>
> Cool! Thanks.
> Btw, did anyone notice that eqmaps.com is now a member only thing?
> I was very disappointed about that.
> luv,
> -Su
>

> guide

> faction
